center.l1: Global transfers to or from WAEMU countries at the
center.l3:
Did you know that a 10% reduction in transaction fees for sending money in & out
of WAEMU country can boost the revenue of regional households by up to 16%?

section2.text:
We support 9 markets and 2 currencies to make it easier for you to transact globally. We’ll be adding more markets and currencies shortly to
          better serve your needs.

calculator.caption:
Unlock the World with
XOF: Your Passport to Seamless Cross-Border Transfers.

section3.super-charge: Connecting WAEMU to the Global Payment Network!
section3.text:
Maraboo is your wallet’s new superpower for international transfers, send up to
$9,900 daily to or from WAEMU countries at the Real Exchange to pay international bills, tuition, suppliers, you name it!
section3.text-2: The Journey Continues: More Countries coming soon, Keep an Eye Peeled.

section4.convert-currency:
Think Global, Act Local:
Send and receive money.
section4.text: International transfers powered by Maraboo built to bring WAEMU to the world in real time. Seamlessly send and receive money across borders using diverse collection and disbursement channels to meet your personal needs or grow your business!

section5.text: Our transfers are processed from start to finish within minutes.
section5.text-2: and we offer the following disbursement options:

step-1.name: Step 1
step-1.text: • Create account • Get a quote • Verify your identity (once) • Select delivery method

step-2.name: Step 2
step-2.text: • Enter recipients details • Review Transaction details • Pay in any currency that we support (XOF or CAD)

step-3.name: Step 3
step-3.text:
We'll be adding more countries soon,
stay tuned.

how-we.name:
How we protect your
personal data
how-we.text: Rest assured, your funds and private information are safeguarded by state-of-the-art security technology, compliant with both local and global regulations

faq.question: What can I do with Maraboo?
faq.answers: Starting with Canada, you can send money in and out of WAEMU countries fast at the interbank rate. We’ll be adding the US and EU shortly after we launch, and then the rest of the world.

faq.question: When is Maraboo launching?
faq.answers: Sometime in 2023. Wanna know more? Join our wait list to stay up to date on our launch!

faq.question: How do I supercharge my cross-border purchasing power with Maraboo?
faq.answers:
• Download the app from your IOS and android app stores
  • Get a quote and provide recipient details
  • Perform you're one time identity verification
  • Pay for your transaction in your currency of choice
  • Instantly receive more!

faq.question: How much can I send per day?
faq.answers: You can send up to $9,900 every 24 hours in and out of any WAEMU country

faq.question: How fast can I transfer money in & out of Africa at the interbank rate?
faq.answers: The great majority of transfers are completed in a few minutes

faq.question: How much does it cost to send a transfer?
faq.answers:
Sending money to Africa - We’re delivering on UN social development goal #10 today, by reducing the cost of sending money to Africa to an average cost of 3% or less

Sending money out of Africa - We’re not only making sending money out of africa up to 3x cheaper than current best in class solutions but we’re also making transfers out of Africa fast and accessible to all by cutting away the red tape.

about-us.name: About us
about-us.caption:
We're building borderless financial systems to connect West-Africans
          across the globe
about-us.text: Introducing Maraboo, a West-African fintech firm offering transformative financial solutions that are fair, responsible, inclusive, and designed to improve the quality of life of West Africans.

section-2.caption: Our Core mission is to make payments in & out of WAEMU countries up to 3x cheaper!
section-2.text:
Did you know that a 10% reduction in transaction fees for sending
              money in & out of WAEMU country can boost the revenue of regional
              households by up to 16%?
section-2.we-believe:
We believe that remittances should be fast, low cost, and have a
              major social impact.
section-2.two: Two birds one stone - we apply the real exchange rate on all of our transactions to save you money and make the UN social development goal by significantly reducing remittance cost by 2030 a reality today!

legal.name: Legal
legal.one: Thank you for your interest in our upcoming launch.
legal.two:
We're working hard to get everything ready and ensure that we
            provide the best possible experience for our customers. Our legal
            documents are currently being finalized and will be made available
            shortly.
legal.three:
In the meantime, we invite you to join our waitlist to be among the
            first to know when we launch. By joining our waitlist, you'll
            receive exclusive updates on our progress, be the first to know when
            we launch, and receive special offers.
legal.four:
Thank you for your patience and support. We can't wait to share our
            product with you!

careers.we: We’re looking for great people to help us build!
careers.opening:
Our Openings:

Thank you for your interest in joining our team!

While we do not currently have any open positions, we are always on the lookout for talented individuals who share our values and are passionate about what we do.

We encourage you to submit your resume and cover letter for future consideration, as we may have opportunities that match your skills and experience in the near future.

We promise to review every application carefully and keep them on file should a suitable opening arise. We look forward to hearing from you and potentially working together in the future!

caption.right: to Canada at the real exchange rate!

section-1.text:
From local to global in real time, Maraboo Magic: Discover 3x
Savings on international money Transfers to or from WAEMU countries!

section-2.caption: to Global Destinations, with 3x the Cost Efficiency
section-2.text: Maraboo is your wallet’s new superpower for international transfers from any WAEMU country. Send up to $9,900 daily at the Real Exchange to pay international bills, tuition, suppliers, you name it! We accept XOF payments by mobile money transfers or by processing your back card
